options: Osmolarity is the number of osmoles per liter of solution
Osmolality is the number of osmoles per kilogram of solvent
In plasma, proteins representing about 7% of the total volume, osmolality equals osmolarity divided by 0.93
Osmolarity and osmolality can be confused for a dilute aqueous solution
Plasma osmolarity is measured by cryoscopy
